price: Ɛnyε Yεn na Yɛdii wͻn amim, na mmom na wͻyε abͻneεfoͻ.
arabic: وَمَا ظَلَمۡنَٰهُمۡ وَلَٰكِن كَانُواْ هُمُ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wamā ẓalamnāhum walākin kānū humu al-ẓālimīna
